requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64 Bit (latest update)
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-6600 or AMD Ryzen™ 5 1400
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce GTX 1650 or AMD Radeon RX 470
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Windows Compatible Audio Device
requirements_en.recommended:

  • Processor: INTEL CORE I7-8700K or AMD RYZEN 5 3600X
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RTX 2060 or AMD Radeon RX 5600XT or Intel® Arc™ A770
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Windows Compatible Audio Device
